name: Mailbox
description: An old mailbox is crookedly planted in the ground near you.

actions.look: It's an old, white mailbox with numbers painted on the side.
actions.take: Try as you might, the mailbox doesn't seem to want to come out of the ground. For some reason I don't think it would be that much use anyway.
actions.go: No offense, but you'd never fit!
actions.read: You can make out a 4, 9, 2, 0, and N (in that order) but that's about it.
